definition: to die/to lose/to be gone/to flee/deceased

sentences.english: The accident of aortic cannulation is very dangerous and the mortality of this complication is quite high.
sentences.chinese: 主动脉插管意外极为凶险，死亡率非常高。

sentences.english: The result: Philly had one of the highest death rates in the country.
sentences.chinese: 结果却导致费城的死亡率高居全美前列。

sentences.english: The death rate of the cancer of breast, lung, bone and leukemias in Xinjiang resident are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 放射性所致居民受照剂量和居民的恶性肿瘤死亡率等。

sentences.english: Global measles deaths decreased by 78% during this period.
sentences.chinese: 在此期间，全球麻疹死亡率下降了78%。

sentences.english: In-theatre mortality was lower than reported for similar settings.
sentences.chinese: 手术室死亡率低于类似情况下报告的死亡率。

sentences.english: In-theatre mortality was lower than reported for similar settings.
sentences.chinese: 手术室死亡率低于类似情况下报告的死亡率。

sentences.english: It says most infant deaths happen in regions where maternal mortality rates are the highest.
sentences.chinese: 大部分婴儿死亡数发生在孕产妇死亡率最高的地区。

sentences.english: The motility of Gushi Chicken was not affected by the feathering growth gene.
sentences.chinese: 羽速基因对固始鸡各阶段的死亡率无显著影响。

sentences.english: Their conclusion was that "sitting time was not associated with all-cause mortality risk."
sentences.chinese: 他们的结论是，“久坐与全因死亡率风险无关。”

sentences.english: There were no differences in noninfectious complications or in mortality.
sentences.chinese: 非传染性并发症和死亡率未见差异。

sentences.english: Tackling high death rates could help change poverty and backwardness.
sentences.chinese: 解决高死亡率的问题可以帮助改变贫穷落后状况。

sentences.english: Serious heart failure is increased by pioglitazone, although without an associated increase in mortality.
sentences.chinese: 吡格列酮增加严重的心衰，虽然死亡率没有增加。

sentences.english: Only three countries have stayed in the top ten for the lowest male death rates all that time.
sentences.chinese: 只有三个国家的男性最低死亡率一直都排在前十位。

sentences.english: Generally, mortality was low except in young piglets.
sentences.chinese: 一般说来，除小猪仔外，死亡率低下。

sentences.english: Objective Decrease mothers and their childrens complications and death rate whose glucose metabolism is anomalous during gestation period.
sentences.chinese: 目的减少妊娠期糖代谢异常的母儿并发症及死亡率。

sentences.english: These strategies combined may reduce total child mortality by 17%.
sentences.chinese: 综合使用这些办法可能使儿童的总死亡率降低17%。

definition: rate of infection (usu. of a disease)
to lead to death/to result in death
